Flappybara.description: Inspired by the popular Flappy Bird game, Flappybara recreates the charm and follows the flying adventures of a capybara.

Go-chella.description: An event planning web app to help organizers plan out a day of acts for their group. Formerly "Brochella".

Discourse.description: A platform for live text chat in private, invite-only servers via URL invite links, inspired by Discord.

Shadow-fight.description: A fighting game inspired by Tekken and Street Fighter, with a backdrop of falling sakura petals or snow
